GTK+ 3 Reference Manual
Top  |  Description

Stock Items

Stock Items — Prebuilt common menu/toolbar items and corresponding icons

Synopsis

#include <gtk/gtk.h>

struct              GtkStockItem;
void                gtk_stock_add                       (const GtkStockItem *items,
                                                         guint n_items);
void                gtk_stock_add_static                (const GtkStockItem *items,
                                                         guint n_items);
GtkStockItem *      gtk_stock_item_copy                 (const GtkStockItem *item);
void                gtk_stock_item_free                 (GtkStockItem *item);
GSList *            gtk_stock_list_ids                  (void);
gboolean            gtk_stock_lookup                    (const gchar *stock_id,
                                                         GtkStockItem *item);
void                gtk_stock_set_translate_func        (const gchar *domain,
                                                         GtkTranslateFunc func,
                                                         gpointer data,
                                                         GDestroyNotify notify);
